You have already read this book. Do you want to remove it from the already read list?
Your are currently reading this book. Do you want to remove it from the currently reading list?
This book is currently in to read list. Do you want to remove it from the list?
from your library? It will remove also all notes. Delete with quotes?
Delete quote category? Everywhere that category was used, quote category will be changed on \"uncategorized\".
Delete this quote? It will not delete its category.
Delete this chapter? It will delete all its notes?
Delete this note? It will delete all its notes?
Click again to exit the application.
No more covers in database. If you cannot find suitable cover, you can take a photo of your book.
Could not successfully add the cover, please try again.
Sorry, something went wrong. If you use custom camera application - try to use device\'s default. If it won\'t help, probably your device is unsupported by the application.
Its basic category, you cannot edit or delete it.
After the app reinstall you won\'t be able to recover data if you haven\'t exported the database
The backup will be created on your google account every app closing
Unable to restore database. You chose wrong database file or the file is damaged.
Something got wrong during importing process.
Successfully restored database. Application will be restarted.
You\'ve chosen wrong directory to export database. Please try again, maybe by other file manager?
Sorry, something went wrong. Please try again.
You cannot change the markerType because it isn\'t the first note of its parent.
